org.mini2Dx.ecs.entity

Interface Entity

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameScreenEntity, UUIDEntity

    public interface Entity
    A common interface for Entity implementations within the Entity-Component-System pattern
    Author:
    Thomas Cashman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addComponent(Component component)
      Adds a Component to this Entity and notifies any attached EntityListeners of this addition
      void addEntityListener(EntityListener listener)
      Adds an EntityListener to this Entity

      Returns all Components that implement the specified the class or interface

      Removes the specified Component from this Entity
      void removeEntityListener(EntityListener listener)
      Removes an EntityListener from this Entity

    • Method Detail

      • addComponent

        void addComponent(Component component)
        Adds a Component to this Entity and notifies any attached EntityListeners of this addition
        Parameters:
        component - An instance of Component

      • getComponents

        <T> List<T> getComponents(Class<T> clazz)
        Returns all Components that implement the specified the class or interface
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Class to search for
        Returns:
        An empty List if no such Components are attached to this Entity

      • removeComponent

        void removeComponent(Component component)
        Removes the specified Component from this Entity
        Parameters:
        component - The Component to remove

      • removeAllComponentsOfType

        <T extends Component> void removeAllComponentsOfType(Class<T> clazz)
        Removes all Components that implement a specific type
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Class to search for

        Adds an EntityListener to this Entity
        Parameters:

      • removeEntityListener

        void removeEntityListener(EntityListener listener)
        Removes an EntityListener from this Entity
        Parameters:
        listener - The EntityListener to be removed
